name: Souco, Inc.
description: Developer of a storage space-sharing platform designed to provide businesses and individuals with a flexible and affordable way to store their belongings. The company's platform offers a nationwide network of storage spaces that can be rented on demand, enabling customers to find storage options for their needs, whether they need to store inventory, furniture or personal belongings.
one_liner: Developer of a storage space-sharing platform designed to provide businesses and individuals with a flexible and affordable way to store their belongings. The company's platform offers a nationwide network of storage spaces that can be rented on demand, enabling customers to find storage options for their needs, whether they need to store inventory, furniture or personal belongings.
